targets.rawSql:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('year', time) as year, SUM(kpi_alert_count) as total_alerts
FROM kpi_1d
WHERE device_identifier IN (${device_identifier})
GROUP BY year
ORDER BY year;

panels.title: Yearly Alert Summary for Device ID ${device_identifier}

RA_PRIORITY_GRANTED_ETA_DELTA_EMERGENCY.text: Deviation ETA granted priority request emergency services

RA_PRIORITY_GRANTED_ETA_DELTA_OTHER.text: Deviation ETA assigned priority request other

RA_PRIORITY_GRANTED_ETA_GREEN_DELTA_EMER.text: Time between ETA priority request and actually green emergency services

RA_PRIORITY_GRANTED_ETA_GREEN_DELTA_OTHE.text: Tijd tussen ETA prioriteitsverzoek en daadwerkelijk groen overig

RA_PRIORITY_GRANTED_PERCENTAGE_EMERGENCY.text: Percentage of emergency services priority request granted

targets.rawSql:
SELECT kpi_type_code, COUNT(*) as occurrences
FROM kpi_1d
WHERE kpi_value_last < kpi_alert_condition_lower_limit_last OR kpi_value_last > kpi_alert_condition_upper_limit_last
AND device_identifier IN (${device_identifier})
AND time >= to_date('${start_date}', 'YYYY-MM')
AND time < to_date('${end_date}', 'YYYY-MM') + INTERVAL '1 month'
GROUP BY kpi_type_code
ORDER BY occurrences DESC;

panels.title: The number of times each KPIs went **Above or Below** the alert threshold for Device ID ${device_identifier}

RA_PRIORITY_GRANTED_ETA_DELTA_EMERGENCY.text: Deviation ETA granted priority request emergency services

RA_PRIORITY_GRANTED_ETA_DELTA_OTHER.text: Deviation ETA assigned priority request other

RA_PRIORITY_GRANTED_ETA_GREEN_DELTA_EMER.text: Time between ETA priority request and actually green emergency services

RA_PRIORITY_GRANTED_ETA_GREEN_DELTA_OTHE.text: Tijd tussen ETA prioriteitsverzoek en daadwerkelijk groen overig

RA_PRIORITY_GRANTED_PERCENTAGE_EMERGENCY.text: Percentage of emergency services priority request granted

targets.rawSql:
SELECT kpi_type_code, COUNT(*) as occurrences
FROM kpi_1d
WHERE kpi_value_last > kpi_alert_condition_upper_limit_last 
AND device_identifier IN (${device_identifier})
AND time >= to_date('${start_date}', 'YYYY-MM')
AND time < to_date('${end_date}', 'YYYY-MM') + INTERVAL '1 month'
GROUP BY kpi_type_code
ORDER BY occurrences DESC;

panels.title: The number of times each KPIs went **Above** the alert threshold for Device ID ${device_identifier}

targets.rawSql:
SELECT kpi_type_code, COUNT(*) as occurrences
FROM kpi_1d
WHERE kpi_value_last < kpi_alert_condition_lower_limit_last
AND device_identifier IN (${device_identifier})
AND time >= to_date('${start_date}', 'YYYY-MM')
AND time < to_date('${end_date}', 'YYYY-MM') + INTERVAL '1 month'
GROUP BY kpi_type_code
ORDER BY occurrences DESC;

panels.description: To identify which KPIs frequently trigger alerts

RA_PRIORITY_GRANTED_ETA_DELTA_OTHER.text: Deviation ETA assigned priority request other

RA_PRIORITY_GRANTED_ETA_GREEN_DELTA_EMER.text: Time between ETA priority request and actually green emergency services

targets.rawSql:
SELECT kpi_type_code, SUM(kpi_alert_count) as total_alerts
FROM kpi_1d
WHERE device_identifier IN (${device_identifier})
AND time >= to_date('${start_date}', 'YYYY-MM')
AND time < to_date('${end_date}', 'YYYY-MM') + INTERVAL '1 month'
GROUP BY kpi_type_code
ORDER BY total_alerts DESC
LIMIT 10; -- Top 5 KPIs

panels.title: Top Number of KPIs with Most Alerts for Device ID ${device_identifier}

RA_PRIORITY_GRANTED_ETA_DELTA_EMERGENCY.text: Deviation ETA granted priority request emergency services

RA_PRIORITY_GRANTED_ETA_DELTA_OTHER.text: Deviation ETA assigned priority request other

targets.rawSql:
SELECT kpi_type_code, SUM(kpi_alert_count) as total_alerts
FROM kpi_1d
WHERE device_identifier IN (${device_identifier})
AND time >= to_date('${start_date}', 'YYYY-MM')
AND time < to_date('${end_date}', 'YYYY-MM') + INTERVAL '1 month'
GROUP BY kpi_type_code;

panels.title: The number of KPI samples that met the alert condition for each KPI type for Device ID ${device_identifier}

panels.description: Display the average KPI value over time for a specific device.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time,  kpi_value_avg
FROM kpi_1d
WHERE device_identifier IN (${device_identifier})
AND time >= to_date('${start_date}', 'YYYY-MM')
AND time < to_date('${end_date}', 'YYYY-MM') + INTERVAL '1 month';

panels.title: Average KPI value over time for Device ID ${device_identifier}

panels.description: Display the alert count value over time for a specific device.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    time,
    AVG(kpi_alert_count) AS avg_alerts
FROM kpi_1d
WHERE device_identifier IN (${device_identifier})
AND time >= to_date('${start_date}', 'YYYY-MM')
AND time < to_date('${end_date}', 'YYYY-MM') + INTERVAL '1 month'
GROUP BY time

panels.title: Average alert count over time for Device ID ${device_identifier}

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    date_trunc('month', time) AS month, 
    AVG(kpi_alert_count) AS avg_alerts
  FROM kpi_1d
WHERE device_identifier = ${device_identifier}
AND time >= to_date('${start_date}', 'YYYY-MM')
AND time < to_date('${end_date}', 'YYYY-MM') + INTERVAL '1 month'
GROUP BY 
    date_trunc('month', time)
ORDER BY 
    month;

panels.title: The density or intensity of average alerts count over time for Device ID ${device_identifier}

targets.rawSql:
SELECT SUM(kpi_alert_count) as total_alerts
FROM kpi_1d
WHERE device_identifier IN (${device_identifier})
AND time >= to_date('${start_date}', 'YYYY-MM')
AND time < to_date('${end_date}', 'YYYY-MM') + INTERVAL '1 month';

panels.title: KPI Alert Count for Device ID${device_identifier}

targets.rawSql:
SELECT kpi_alert_condition_type_last, COUNT(*) as count
FROM kpi_1d
WHERE device_identifier IN (${device_identifier})
AND time >= to_date('${start_date}', 'YYYY-MM')
AND time < to_date('${end_date}', 'YYYY-MM') + INTERVAL '1 month'
GROUP BY kpi_alert_condition_type_last;

panels.title: The distribution of different alert conditions for Device ID ${device_identifier}

panels.description: KPIs close to their alert thresholds but haven't triggered an alert yet.

RA_PRIORITY_GRANTED_ETA_DELTA_EMERGENCY.text: Deviation ETA granted priority request emergency services

RA_PRIORITY_GRANTED_ETA_DELTA_OTHER.text: Deviation ETA assigned priority request other

RA_PRIORITY_GRANTED_ETA_GREEN_DELTA_EMER.text: Time between ETA priority request and actually green emergency services

RA_PRIORITY_GRANTED_ETA_GREEN_DELTA_OTHE.text: Tijd tussen ETA prioriteitsverzoek en daadwerkelijk groen overig

RA_PRIORITY_GRANTED_PERCENTAGE_EMERGENCY.text: Percentage of emergency services priority request granted

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time, kpi_type_code, kpi_value_last, kpi_alert_condition_lower_limit_last, kpi_alert_condition_upper_limit_last
FROM kpi_1d
WHERE device_identifier IN (${device_identifier})
AND time >= to_date('${start_date}', 'YYYY-MM')
AND time < to_date('${end_date}', 'YYYY-MM') + INTERVAL '1 month'
AND kpi_alert_count = 0
AND (kpi_value_last < kpi_alert_condition_lower_limit_last + 10 OR kpi_value_last > kpi_alert_condition_upper_limit_last - 10);

panels.title: KPIs Close to Alert Thresholds for Device ID${device_identifier}

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', time) as month, kpi_type_code, AVG(kpi_value_avg) as monthly_avg
FROM kpi_1d
WHERE device_identifier IN (${device_identifier})
GROUP BY month, kpi_type_code
ORDER BY month, kpi_type_code;

panels.title: All time Monthly Average of KPIs for Device ID ${device_identifier}

targets.rawSql:
SELECT * FROM kpi_1d 
WHERE device_identifier IN (${device_identifier})
AND time >= to_date('${start_date}', 'YYYY-MM')
AND time < to_date('${end_date}', 'YYYY-MM') + INTERVAL '1 month';
